cause.description:
Now is the time to band together and overthrow Chris and his tyrant-like ways. We need a manager, not a monkey. Although, right now, a monkey might be better than what we have. At least you could teach a monkey cash...
1. Stores need managers, not useless wastes of space (alot of space i might add)
2. Chris is stupid
3. Chris is stupid (again)
4. Chris is still stupid
5. Get Chris out of 142
cause.mission: free Petcetera Store 142 of Chris, the worst manager our store has ever seen.
cause.name: Free 142
